tag_list: entrepreneur, consultant, business-strategist, marketing-strategist, technology, start-up
overview:
Colette Turbeville is an American businesswoman and technology executive. She sold her first company to Infoteria in 2012, and is currently involved in bringing international software products to the US market.

Colette also works as an international advisor to startups–specifically focused on developing a winning market position, strategic alliances and successful exit strategies.

Colette was involved in the successful M&A of Extentech, and now is involved in launching Infoteria US, bringing their products to the US market.

As Chief Marketing Officer for Extentech, Turbeville oversaw partnership relations, managed the company’s social media initiatives, and worked with the firm’s 20,000-member developer community, among other responsibilities.

In April of 2007, Turbeville served as Marketing and Public Relations Director for West Coast Green, producer of the nation’s largest residential green building conference and exposition. Among her duties, Turbeville generated coverage of the conference with over 20,000 national and international media outlets. She also launched West Coast Green’s promotional material for over 200 print and media outlets.
